abort.incomplete_info: Incomplete information to set up device, no host or token supplied.
abort.not_xiaomi_miio: Device is not (yet) supported by Xiaomi Miio.

error.unknown_device: The device model is not known, not able to set up the device using config flow.
error.cloud_no_devices: No devices found in this Xiaomi Miio cloud account.
error.cloud_credentials_incomplete: Cloud credentials incomplete, please fill in username, password and country
error.cloud_login_error: Could not login to Xiaomi Miio Cloud, check the credentials.

reauth_confirm.description: The Xiaomi Miio integration needs to re-authenticate your account in order to update the tokens or add missing cloud credentials.
reauth_confirm.title: [%key:common::config_flow::title::reauth%]

cloud.description: Log in to the Xiaomi Miio cloud, see https://www.openhab.org/addons/bindings/miio/#country-servers for the cloud server to use.

select.description: Select the Xiaomi Miio device to set up.

manual.description: You will need the 32 character API token, see https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/xiaomi_miio#retrieving-the-access-token for instructions. Please note, that this API token is different from the key used by the Xiaomi Aqara integration.

data.cloud_subdevices: Use cloud to get connected subdevices

fan_reset_filter.name: Fan reset filter
fan_reset_filter.description: Resets the filter lifetime and usage.

entity_id.name: Entity ID
entity_id.description: Name of the xiaomi miio entity.

fan_set_extra_features.name: Fan set extra features
fan_set_extra_features.description: Manipulates a storage register which advertises extra features. The Mi Home app evaluates the value. A feature called "turbo mode" is unlocked in the app on value 1.

features.name: Features
features.description: Integer, known values are 0 (default) and 1 (turbo mode).

time_period.name: Time period
time_period.description: Time period for the delayed turn off.

light_reminder_on.name: Light reminder on
light_reminder_on.description: Enables the eye fatigue reminder/notification (EYECARE SMART LAMP 2 ONLY).

entity_id.name: Entity ID
entity_id.description: Name of the entity to act on.

light_reminder_off.name: Light reminder off
light_reminder_off.description: Disables the eye fatigue reminder/notification (EYECARE SMART LAMP 2 ONLY).

light_night_light_mode_on.name: Night light mode on
light_night_light_mode_on.description: Turns the eyecare mode on (EYECARE SMART LAMP 2 ONLY).

light_night_light_mode_off.name: Night light mode off
light_night_light_mode_off.description: Turns the eyecare mode fan_set_dry_off (EYECARE SMART LAMP 2 ONLY).

remote_learn_command.name: Remote learn command
remote_learn_command.description: Learns an IR command, press "Call Service", point the remote at the IR device, and the learned command will be shown as a notification in Overview.

slot.name: Slot
slot.description: Define the slot used to save the IR command.

timeout.name: Timeout
timeout.description: Define the timeout, before which the command must be learned.

vacuum_remote_control_start.name: Vacuum remote control start
vacuum_remote_control_start.description: Starts remote control of the vacuum cleaner. You can then move it with `remote_control_move`, when done call `remote_control_stop`.

vacuum_remote_control_stop.name: Vacuum remote control stop
vacuum_remote_control_stop.description: Stops remote control mode of the vacuum cleaner.

vacuum_remote_control_move.name: Vacuum remote control move
vacuum_remote_control_move.description: Remote controls the vacuum cleaner, make sure you first set it in remote control mode with `remote_control_start`.

vacuum_remote_control_move_step.name: Vacuum remote control move step
vacuum_remote_control_move_step.description: Remote controls the vacuum cleaner, only makes one move and then stops.

vacuum_clean_zone.name: Vacuum clean zone
vacuum_clean_zone.description: Starts the cleaning operation in the selected areas for the number of repeats indicated.

zone.name: Zone
zone.description: Array of zones. Each zone is an array of 4 integer values.

repeats.name: Repeats
repeats.description: Number of cleaning repeats for each zone.

vacuum_clean_segment.name: Vacuum clean segment
vacuum_clean_segment.description: Starts cleaning of the specified segment(s).
